document.title: Counting Is Easier while Experiencing a Congruent Motion
document.citation: Lugli L, Baroni G, Anelli F, Borghi AM, Nicoletti R (2013) Counting Is Easier while Experiencing a Congruent Motion. PLoS ONE 8(5):e64500. doi:10.1371/journal/pone.0064500 Retrieved from http://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0064500 on 04 Oct 2016.
